name: Weird City Interloper
description:
Pull up your hood, lower your gaze and enter the city of Zendon. If you can gather enough information, you may just be able to change the course of history.

🧙 Type words from the phrases in square brackets at the ">" and press enter.

🔎 Press return at an empty ">" for a list of phrases you've learned.

👻 If you want to change the way topics are highlighted, enter the command "output".

🐀 And if you get stuck, use the topic "help" with Lissa.

🐌 This game was originally released in 2014. It was a XYZZY Awards nominee for "Best NPCS".

🧠 You can download a .zblorb version of the game from this link, if you know how to use it.

(Icons released by Lorc under a Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 license.)
